name: Authority to adopt rules
text: §431:10H-117  Authority to adopt rules.  The commissioner may adopt reasonable rules to promote premium adequacy and to protect the policyholder in the event of substantial rate increases, and to establish minimum standards for marketing practices, producer compensation, producer testing, penalties, and reporting practices for long-term care insurance. [L 1999, c 93, pt of §2; am L 2003, c 212, §95]
